biotools.summary: PlabiPD currently hosts data functional annotation of plant genomes using the MapMan Annotation, it also offers a webservice "Mercator" to automatically annotate and classify plant FASTA sequence in bulk submission. Also to visualize Plant expression data on metabolic maps.

bioschemas.name: PlabiPD
bioschemas.summary: PlabiPD currently hosts data functional annotation of plant genomes using the MapMan Annotation, it also offers a webservice "Mercator" to automatically annotate and classify plant FASTA sequence in bulk submission. Also to visualize Plant expression data on metabolic maps.
